trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />를 다시 시작하는 트리거 동작을 지원합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> 일시 중지 다시 시작 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> 개체 에서만 다시 시작할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 일시 중지 하 고 영향을 주지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 다른 상태에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지할 수를 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> 개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 하 여 제어할 수 참조 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> 지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 으로 시작 된 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard" /> class.
